about.banner.title: About Us
about.section.title: About Kuttyma
about.section.text: Kuttyma Inc. was founded in 2024 by siblings Keshav and Srinidhi Kotteswaran after seeing artisans in Coimbatore struggle to sell online. Our mission is to democratize digital commerce for India's 63 million small businesses with affordable, fully managed websites.
about.list.empowerment: Empowerment – enabling entrepreneurs to grow online
about.list.cultural: Cultural Sensitivity – respecting local languages and customs
about.list.innovation: Innovation – practical tech for real business problems
about.quote.text: Our 25 pilot clients already generate ₹50,000 in monthly revenue with 90% referrals and 0% churn.
about.quote.name: Priya Kuttyma
